DataElement.preferredName: Continue Therapeutic Procedure Preventive Intervention And/Or Acute Graft Versus Host Disease Administered Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The indicator that describes whether or not a therapeutic procedure was continued from preventive intervention and/or acute graft versus host disease or if it was previously reported.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Continue Therapeutic Procedure Preventive Intervention And/Or Acute Graft Versus Host Disease Administered
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Remain in force or carry on without letup; keep or maintain in unaltered condition; exist in time or space without stop or interruption._An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process.:Therapeutic, nutritional, environmental, social and/or behavioral interventions at the societal, community, organizational or individual levels to reduce, modify or stop the course of a disease._Used to indicate that either or both of two items or options may be valid._A syndrome of immunologically mediated tissue damage that may occur following an allogeneic transplant, usually affecting the skin, liver, and GI tract. The onset is usually within one hundred days of transplantation or immunologic manipulation._The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Existing in time or space without stop or interruption.:An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process.

Concepts.definition: Remain in force or carry on without letup; keep or maintain in unaltered condition; exist in time or space without stop or interruption.
An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process.

Property.preferredName: Preventive Intervention And/Or Acute Graft Versus Host Disease Administered
Property.preferredDefinition: Therapeutic, nutritional, environmental, social and/or behavioral interventions at the societal, community, organizational or individual levels to reduce, modify or stop the course of a disease._Used to indicate that either or both of two items or options may be valid._A syndrome of immunologically mediated tissue damage that may occur following an allogeneic transplant, usually affecting the skin, liver, and GI tract. The onset is usually within one hundred days of transplantation or immunologic manipulation._The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

Concepts.definition: Therapeutic, nutritional, environmental, social and/or behavioral interventions at the societal, community, organizational or individual levels to reduce, modify or stop the course of a disease.
Used to indicate that either or both of two items or options may be valid.

A syndrome of immunologically mediated tissue damage that may occur following an allogeneic transplant, usually affecting the skin, liver, and GI tract. The onset is usually within one hundred days of transplantation or immunologic manipulation.
The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

ValueDomain.preferredName: Yes No Unk ND NA Previous Report Indicator
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Indicator of Yes, No, Unknown, Not done, Not applicable or Previously reported to a question.[manually curated].

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Occurring prior to something else.: Report; a short account.

Concepts.definition: Occurring prior to something else.
A short textual account; having provided a short account.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

Concepts.definition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Indicates a task, process or examination that has either not been initiated or completed.

Concepts.definition: Indicates a task, process or examination that has either not been initiated or not been completed.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredName: Yes No Unknown Not Done Not Applicable Previous Report Indicator
RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.:The non-affirmative response to a question.:Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.:Indicates a task, process or examination that has either not been initiated or not been completed.:Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.:Occurring prior to something else.:A short textual account; having provided a short account.:An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.
The non-affirmative response to a question.
Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.
Indicates a task, process or examination that has either not been initiated or not been completed.

An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.
